website_summaries.verdict: A great choice for novice makeup users. Easy to use, easy to apply, and leaves brushes clean and conditioned.
pros: Oil-based but lightweight spray that helps dissolve makeup residue
A good value for the price
cons: Not as effective on sponges as it is on beauty blenders and brushes

customer_reviews.title: Very fragrant and not in a good way
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this on a whim because I’m always looking for a good brush shampoo. This is very scented and reminds me of the perfume my grandmother used to wear. It’s floral and powdery smelling and I’m not into it. I love Japonesque brushes but this is a pass for me.
customer_reviews.author: kickinitoldskool

customer_reviews.title: Smells good, cleans good.
customer_reviews.text: Gets all the makeup, dust and gunk out without damaging brush bristles
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

customer_reviews.title: Deep cleaning brush shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy this brush shampoo from Ulta until they stopped selling it. I've tried other brands but this one is my favorite. My brushes are so clean after I use it, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Mimms

customer_reviews.title: The best makeup brush cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I live how well this works. It cleans the brushes by removing all pigments and I live the smell. It’s the only cleanser I use.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Hewett

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I truly love this product there's nothing else that I have tried that works like this. The brushes at the end of every clean are very soft. I truly like and would recommend 100%.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna paz

customer_reviews.title: Great at cleaning brushes daily
customer_reviews.text: I love this products because it gets my brushes clean and keeps them in good condition. I also like the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Ritter

customer_reviews.title: It was very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I had a 20 year old makeup brush that I had never washed. After using this shampoo, I was surprised how much old makeup came out. It was very easy to use. I simply wet my brush, and put a dab of this shampoo on my palm. Then rubbed the brush tip on my palm. After repeated rinse and wash it finally cleared out decades worth of makeup. The product calls it a shampoo, but I never saw any suds or soap. It simply just releases the makeup from the bristles. After finishing the cleanup and the dry up. The brush was still nice and soft, so there was no fear of it stiffening up due to soap residue.
customer_reviews.author: Fathom

customer_reviews.title: JAPONESQUE Makeup Brush Soap
customer_reviews.text: This soap is supposed to be used to clean dirty make-up brushes. I had a few make-up brushes with old make-up left in them, literally for years with a couple of them. I found those lost in the hinterlands of my make-up drawers. I used both the Japonesque and some liquid dish soap. Both did about the same. The brushes came clean so I'm not real sure why the Japonesque is better to use than liquid dish soap. I guess the smaller bottle is easier to keep in your bathroom drawers or countertops than a large bottle of dish soap. But other than that, I didn't find it especially wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: loveguitar

customer_reviews.title: This smells amazing!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I used use a gentle dishsoap like Dawn to wash my brushes but then it was pointed out to me that while that isn't terrible and it gets them clean, it didn't have anything in it that helps condition the bristles of a makeup brushes. That totally makes sense to me and I have noticed that my brushes I have that I have only washed with the japonesque soap are lasting longer than the brushes washed with the dish soap. Plus, this brush cleaner smells absolutrly incredible!!!! I honestly wish there was a body wash with this scent or shampoo even, I could bathe in it for sure!!! I'm about to order my second bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for My Needs
customer_reviews.text: This cleaner has an odd smell, but it isn't anything that can't be ignored. It cleans my brushes nicely. though with my heavier theater makeups I tend to need to shampoo twice to get all the makeup out. Ulta has graded this brand as a "cruelty free" product as well, if you, like me, look for such things in your products.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey Sterling

customer_reviews.title: love
customer_reviews.text: i use this to clean my makeup brushes at least once a week. I wear make up every day so I feel better if I get them clean at least once a week. This works even on sparklie eyeshadow that use with one of my brushes for my eyes. I like that it is easy, washed out cleanly and did not damage my brushes. I would use this one all the time. Nice clean smell after too.
customer_reviews.author: Tina (Redzworld)

customer_reviews.title: LOVE the scent and how well the product works
customer_reviews.text: LOVE the scent and how well the product works. I have white bristled brushes that I use daily that haven't been cleaned in a very long time. It cleaned most of them back to white and worked wonderfully at getting all the dried up foundation transfer with powder use off the brushes!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Condo

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended.
customer_reviews.text: This makeup brush shampoo does clean the bristles well but I think I could just use some Dawn and get the same results. I don't clean those brushes very often so I don't really see a need for this.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. ChaCha

customer_reviews.title: Clean brushes = best results!
customer_reviews.text: It's known makeup fact that good, clean brushes yield optimal results! Japonesque helps the novice to the professional to keep brushes in optimal condition, insuring your freshest face forward!
customer_reviews.author: TheSovereign

product_meta.title: JAPONESQUE Conditioning Makeup Brush & Sponge Shampoo, 4 Fl Oz
product_meta.description:
Conditioning Makeup Brush Shampoo with Argan Oil

BRAND STORY
Preferred by celebrated makeup artists and beauty professionals worldwide. Japonesque products are an essential for the beauty enthusiast who desires expert results.
